data.title: Favorite fried chicken
data.text: Their food is always fresh and friendly service.  Love the Tuesday special. Red beans and rice and and mash potatoes beats any of the competitors sides.

data.title: best fried spicy chicken wings
data.text: …when that food hits the table. It’s always super-hot and delicious...I can’t help but shove all the food down my throat.e…AND THE PRICES ARE REALLY GOOD.

data.title: Food review
data.text: The food had no flavour. It was very expensive for fast food. Service was very slow. Sides were not eatable. The best thing was the sauce they give you on the side.

data.title: Chicken good-price bad
data.text: Popeye;s is very strange about how they do business. They have some of the best chicken around but they want to act like they can't price their chicken any lower that others places. Even KFC got it together and lowered their prices. Us black folk can definitely find a lower price to buy our bird. The joint will go out of business if does not change. One bright spot- their Tuesday special-$2.99 for two piece and biscuit-limit 4

data.title: Still Good, Consistent Fried Chicken
data.text: It doesn't compare to the quality it used to be back in the 90's, with the spicy mashed potatoes and honey biscuits, but it's surprising how often it gets mentioned in people's top 10's. You'd think it would be an independent restaurant, but that goes to show you that a chain can make decent fried chicken. Their beans and rice are delicious and I even like their popcorn shrimp now. Still prefer Louisiana's and Dinah's, but always consistent...and it doesn't make me sick like KFC chicken...something is eerily wrong with them..my tummy tells me so...Popeys is one of the better Fried Chicken options out there.
